attributes.background:
To refrain from Castle hill primary school & governors ending the lease of Piglets Pre School on 18th July 2017
1: Oppose the termination of the lease
2: Insure that sufficient child care establishment is kept in the local vicinity
3: Continue to support the unnecessary closure

rejection.details: This decision is the responsibility of the school, not the Government or Parliament. You could raise this with the school's senior management and/or the governing body.
